item.title: Scrubbing URL fragments from Sentry crash reports
item.description: When activating Sentry crash reporting in JavaScript client-side code, the default mechanism captures and sends the current URL, including any URL fragments. This can pose a privacy issue when dealing with client-side end-to-end encrypted applications.

item.title: GitOps CI/CD workflows with GitHub Actions
item.description: The current state of GitHub Actions is promising but still has some rough edges, when it comes to configuring complete GitOps CI/CD workflows. But I've managed to find some tricks to get the job done.
